alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 7:32PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Marshall, southeastern Roseau, northwestern Beltrami and southern Lake of the Woods Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 732 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pitt to 6 miles west of Gates Corner. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baudette, Williams, Roosevelt, Norris Camp, Clementson, southeastern Hayes Lake State Park and Zippel Bay State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Marshall; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; Roseau
